addr: Hammersmith Road. Kensington. LONDON W14 8UX GB
title: English Junior Rapidplay
desc: The English Junior Rapidplay is open to all juniors with ECF Silver membership  . Only English players can win titles.? This tournament is only open to players who are ECF Silver, Gold or Platinum members. Players can become members via the ECF website:? http://www.englishchess.org.uk/membership/joining/? Or by phoning the ECF Office between 9am to 5pm between Monday to Friday: 01424775222 The tournament is a combined tournament with players of all ages in one section. Players? ages are not taken into consideration for the purposes of pairing two players against one another in any round. The Age Category prizes are awarded to the highest scoring player in the following age groups: Under 18, U16, U14, U12, U10, U8 (age at September 1st 2015). No players may win more than one prize. In the event of a tie on any scoregroup, the prize money will be shared. However, there will be a blitz playoff to determine the overall Champion. The exact format of this playoff will be determined once the number of players in the tie-break is determined.
